changeSet.author: mcpierce
changeSet.createView: SELECT DISTINCT d.publisher as publisher, d.series as series, d.volume as volume, d.issue_number as issue_number, d.cover_date as cover_date, COUNT(*) as count FROM comic_details d WHERE publisher IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH (publisher) > 0 AND series IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH (series) > 0 AND volume IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH (volume) > 0 AND issue_number IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH (issue_number) > 0 AND cover_date IS NOT NULL GROUP BY d.publisher, d.series, d.volume, d.issue_number, d.cover_date HAVING COUNT (*) > 1
